# Circlet of Persuasion
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** head

**Price** 4,500 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This silver headband grants a +3 competence bonus on the wearer’s Charisma-based checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Eagle's Splendor (Spell)|eagle’s splendor]]*

**Cost** 2,250 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 506
